alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 7:44PM CDT until September 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PERKINS AND SOUTHWESTERN KEITH COUNTIES... At 644 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Big Springs, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wild Horse Spring. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 71 and 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
